text: No because posting to pages does nothing.
Hey there, can anyone point me in the direction of a little assistance with working with the chat bot on a SPA (specifically vuejs?). Thank you:slightly_smiling_face:
HI <@UQWB8GG3H> looks like you’re going to need <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/conversations_api/HubSpot-conversations-javascript-api>
You’ll want to create a new component, maintain state locally and pass configuration in as props (I havent used Vue before - just react)
but the principles are the same

Looking to build a member portal that will be restricted content via HubSpot marketing enterprise — can it be developed in such a way where depending on what services a particular member subscribes to they see different variations of the page? i.e. if a member uses our health insurance they see a link to their forms, but if we know they don't subscribe to our health insurance they see an advertisement to become an insurance member? Thanks!

Hi
I am displaying a thank you message after HubSpot form submit, i want to again display form on close button click without page reload.
